text: The Bathurst 1000 is a car race held at Mount Panorama, Bathurst, New South Wales, Australia. It is held every year. ==List of winners== Phillip Island (500 Miles) 1960 Armstrong 500 John Roxburgh / Frank Coad Vauxhall Cresta 167 laps / 8h 19m 99.1s 1961 Armstrong 500 Bob Jane / Harry Firth
